trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `webControls` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection> 類別 (Class) 提供以程式的方法，存取和修改組態檔的 `webControls` 區段。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides a shared location for the client script files, where they can be accessed from multiple pages and across applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的共用的位置的用戶端指令碼檔案，其中它們可以可從多個頁面和存取跨應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection> can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection>可以讀取和寫入資訊的相關區段的組態檔區段屬性根據<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其實<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection> object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection>從現有的 Web 應用程式相關聯的組態檔的物件。
建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。
取得用戶端指令碼位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the client scripts.
For details about the client scripts and their use, refer to [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端指令碼及其用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端指令碼中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection.ClientScriptsLocation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection.ClientScriptsLocation%2A>。
